scripts.deploy:local: export $(cat ../../.env.anvil | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npm run build && mud deploy --profile=local --worldAddress ${WORLD_ADDRESS}
scripts.deploy:garnet: export $(cat ../../.env.garnet | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npm run build && mud deploy --profile=garnet --worldAddress ${WORLD_ADDRESS}
